landing.title: Remember what
landing.subtitle: AlzaHelp helps people with Alzheimer's and memory challenges stay connected to their loved ones, medications, and daily routines through voice AI and smart reminders.

voice.title: Voice Companion
voice.desc: Say "Hey Memory" to get medication reminders, hear your daily schedule, or simply have a conversation.

medication.title: Medication Tracking
medication.desc: Never miss a dose with smart reminders, voice-powered intake logging, and real-time caregiver alerts.

family.title: Family Connections
family.desc: Keep photos, stories, and contact info for loved ones always at your fingertips. Ask the AI who anyone is.

safety.title: Safety Net
safety.desc: Geofencing, SOS alerts, and fall detection keep caregivers informed and patients safe.

patients.title: For Patients
patients.desc: Talk to your AI companion, play memory games, and stay connected to your daily routine and loved ones.

caregivers.title: For Doctors & Caregivers
caregivers.desc: Manage medications and care instructions from the portal or via Telegram/WhatsApp chatbot.

ai.title: AI-Powered
ai.desc: Semantic search understands context. Ask about memories naturally and get intelligent, caring responses.

dashboard.demoBanner: You're exploring AlzaHelp in demo mode.
dashboard.demoSignup: Sign up free to save your own data.

onboarding.title: Welcome to AlzaHelp!
onboarding.subtitle: Let's set up a couple of things. This takes about 1 minute.
onboarding.photoPrompt: Upload a photo of yourself or your family
onboarding.installDesc: Add AlzaHelp to your home screen for quick access

referral.title: Invite Your Family
